text: aur hamane isaraeel kee santaan ko achchha, sammaanit thikaana diya au unhen achchhee aajeevika pradaan kee. phir unhonne us samay vibhed kiya, jabaki gyaan unake paas aa chuka tha. nishchay hee tumhaara rab qiyaamat ke din unake beech us cheez ka faisala kar dega, jisamen ve vibhed karate rahe hai
